thread.section_title: Hotel Agora - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location is good. The rest isn't so much.
thread.title_full: Location is good. The rest isn't so much. - Review of Hotel Agora, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: RosDublin
title: Location is good. The rest isn't so much.
text:
The room was clean, the heating worked (it was very cold outside) and location is superb. That's about it.
Poor quality of sleep. Very noisy from the outside and especially from within the hotel. The walls are so thin we could hear neighbours from both sides and from above.
The WiFi was appalling. Hardly worked at all.
Electrical sockets were only working when bed side lights were on (you either sleep or charge your phone in full light, can't do both).
Room was tired with quick-fix patches of different type of wall papers. It was so small i could not fit even third of it into one picture. The bed cover was so old and overused it had holes in it.
Even for a 2 star property it's kind of bad.
Overall, it did the job but I would not stay again.
